      • intersectsRectangleRectangle

        public static boolean intersectsRectangleRectangle(float r1x,
                                                   float r1y,
                                                   float r1width,
                                                   float r1height,
                                                   float r2x,
                                                   float r2y,
                                                   float r2width,
                                                   float r2height)
        checks whether two rectangles intersect
        Parameters:
        r1x - the x-position of the first rectangle
        r1y - the y-position of the first rectangle
        r1width - the width of the first rectangle (must be positive)
        r1height - the height of the first rectangle (must be positive)
        r2x - the x-position of the second rectangle
        r2y - the y-position of the second rectangle
        r2width - the width of the second rectangle (must be positive)
        r2height - the height of the second rectangle (must be positive)
        Returns:
        true, if the rectangles intersect

      • intersectsRectangleCircle

        public static boolean intersectsRectangleCircle(float rx,
                                                float ry,
                                                float rWidth,
                                                float rHeight,
                                                float cx,
                                                float cy,
                                                float cRadius)
        checks whether a rectangle and a circle intersect
        Parameters:
        rx - the x-position of the rectangle
        ry - the y-position of the rectangle
        rWidth - the width of the rectangle (must be positive)
        rHeight - the height of the rectangle (must be positive)
        cx - the x-position (center) of the circle
        cy - the y-position (center) of the circle
        cRadius - the radius of the circle
        Returns:
        true, if the rectangles and the circle intersect

                                              float lx2,

                                              java.util.List<Vector2f> intersections)
        checks whether a rectangle and a line segment intersect and returns them in intersections
        Parameters:
        rx - the x-position of the rectangle
        ry - the y-position of the rectangle
        rWidth - the width of the rectangle (must be positive)
        rHeight - the height of the rectangle (must be positive)
        lx1 - the x-position of the first point of the line segment
        ly1 - the y-position of the first point of the line segment
        lx2 - the x-position of the second point of the line segment
        ly2 - the y-position of the second point of the line segment
        intersections - the intersection points or null
        Returns:
        true, if the rectangles and the line segment intersect

        rHeight - the height of the rectangle (must be positive)

        Parameters:
        x1 - the x-position of the first point of the first line segment
        y1 - the y-position of the first point of the first line segment

        y2 - the y-position of the second point of the first line segment
        x3 - the x-position of the first point of the second line segment
        y3 - the y-position of the first point of the second line segment
        x4 - the x-position of the second point of the second line segment
        y4 - the y-position of the second point of the second line segment
        intersection - the intersection or null
        Returns:

      • getClosestPointOnLine

        public static Vector2f getClosestPointOnLine(float x1,
                                             float y1,
                                             float x2,
                                             float y2,
                                             float px,
                                             float py)
        Calculates the point on the line segment nearest to the given point
        Parameters:
        x1 - the x-position of the first point of the line segment
        y1 - the y-position of the first point of the line segment
        x2 - the x-position of the second point of the line segment
        y2 - the y-position of the second point of the line segment
        px - the x-position of the point
        py - the y-position of the point
        Returns:
        the point on the line segment nearest the the point

      • pointOnLine

        public static boolean pointOnLine(float x1,
                                  float y1,
                                  float x2,
                                  float y2,
                                  float px,
                                  float py,
                                  float EPSILON)
        checks whether the given point is on the line segment
        Parameters:
        x1 - the x-position of the first point of the line segment
        y1 - the y-position of the first point of the line segment
        x2 - the x-position of the second point of the line segment
        y2 - the y-position of the second point of the line segment
        px - the x-position of the point
        py - the y-position of the point
        EPSILON - the precision. Smaller value = higher precision. default = 0.1

      • pointInPolygon

        public static boolean pointInPolygon(Vector2f[] polygon,
                                     float x,
                                     float y)
        checks whether the given point is inside the polygon
        Parameters:
        polygon - the points of the polygon
        x - the x-position of the point
        y - the y-position of the point
        Returns:
        true, if the point is inside the polygon

      • pointInRectangle

        public static boolean pointInRectangle(float minX,
                                       float minY,
                                       float maxX,
                                       float maxY,
                                       float x,
                                       float y)
        checks whether the given point is inside the rectangle
        Parameters:
        minX - x-position of the bottom left corner
        minY - y-position of the bottom left corner
        maxX - x-position of the top right corner
        maxY - y-position of the top right corner
        x - the x-position of the point
        y - the y-position of the point
        Returns:
        true, if the point is inside the rectangle

        public static boolean pointInTriangle(float x1,
                                      float y1,
                                      float x2,
                                      float y2,
                                      float x3,
                                      float y3,
                                      float px,
                                      float py)
        checks whether the given point is inside the triangle
        Parameters:
        x1 - the x-position of the first point of the triangle
        y1 - the y-position of the first point of the triangle
        x2 - the x-position of the second point of the triangle
        y2 - the y-position of the second point of the triangle
        x3 - the x-position of the third point of the triangle
        y3 - the y-position of the third point of the triangle
        px - the x-position of the point
        py - the y-position of the point
        Returns:
        true, if the point is inside the triangle
